data.name: The Labyrinth Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Labyrinth Demo is a tester for the full release of The Labyrinth. This is a graphical and performance overhaul of the original as well as having certain mechanics tweaked and changed entirely. The demo is a stripped-down version of the complete game, currently missing key components as they haven't been developed yet.

Here is what is finished and is in the demo:
  • Full character creation
  • Saving/loading across 3 files
  • Floor generation
  • Item generation
  • Framework for combat. Combat itself is not going to be in the demo, but stat changes, listeners, and status effects are implemented and working

Here is what is not finished and isn't in the demo:
  • Tutorial
  • Achievements
  • Stat tracking
  • Combat
  • Spell allocation
  • End-game content, the game is unbeatable and goes on forever

When the game is complete the demo will be a complete version of the game with certain features restricted such as achievements, character creation, and run length.

data.short_description: The Labyrinth Demo is a demo for the official release of 2017's The Labyrinth. This is a graphical and performance overhaul with all of the same features as the original game but with a fresh coat of paint and more added onto it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Literally any external/integrated card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is a simple Flash game, if you have any computer then odds are you can play this game
